Home > Worthopedia–Price Guide > Ethnic, Folk&Native American Art > Cowboy Ranger Style Silver End Piece for Belt~Fancy~ Terms and Conditions for using our site
Cowboy Ranger Style Silver End Piece for Belt~Fancy~ 4 Sold For: or Sign In to see what it's worth. Sold Date: 05/01/2007 Channel: Online Auction Source: eBay Category: Ethnic, Folk&Native American Art
A nice condition silver end piece for a leather belt that has a fancy top&appears to have been never used. We could find no mark, but it has been professionally checked&is definitely silver or sterling. It weighs 6.9 grams, measures 15/16 by near 5/8" (across the top)&would fit on the belt at approx. 9/16". A quality made end piece&fine addition to the belt put ton !!!! PLEASE READ THE FOLLOWING CAREFULLY: WINNING BIDDERS: Please complete Check out within 3 days. POSTAGE For U.S. Customers Only: Postage&Delivery Confirmation.. Is $3.00 within U.S...Insurance is optional in the United States Only...Starts at $1.35 for up to $50.00...Insurance will be calculated at the end of the auction according to winning bid amount. These postage calculations are strictly for the U.S.... We are not responsible for lost or damaged items that aren't insured , Internationally or U.S... PAYMENT for U.S. Bidders are as follows: Bidpay, Money Orders, Personal Check, Cashier's Check. (Please allow time for check to clear.) PAYMENT FOR INTERNATIONAL BIDDERS : BIDPAY.... On all International winning bids we ad to custom regulations. Please do not ask for your package to be declared as a gift or lower value. International shipping can be by air letter post registered, air parcel post w. insurance or global priority. (Your Choice:) Please Remember, we are not responsible for International lost or damaged items that aren't insured. Thanks so much for understanding. We appreciate your business !!!! (You must be at least 18 years of age in order to purchase a knife from one of our auctions.) This auction seller accepts auction payments from BidPay ® ! - Free for Buyers - pay using your Visa or MasterCard. Click to pay.
